meta.description: Optimize the number of tricks performed by otters and dolphins given treat constraints and performer limits.

sets.name: PERFORMERS
sets.description: Types of performers in the aquarium show.

params.name: tricks_per_performance
params.description: Number of tricks each performer type can do per performance.

params.name: treats_per_performance
params.description: Number of treats required for each performer type per performance.

params.name: max_otter_ratio
params.description: Maximum ratio of otters among all performers.

vars.name: performances
vars.description: Number of performances by each type of performer.

objective.name: max_total_tricks
objective.description: Maximize the total number of tricks performed.

constraints.name: treats_constraint
constraints.description: Total treats used by all performances must not exceed available treats.

constraints.name: min_dolphins_constraint
constraints.description: At least the minimum number of dolphins must perform.

constraints.name: max_otter_ratio_constraint
constraints.description: The number of otters must not exceed the maximum allowed ratio of total performers.
